content:
Announcements

Date Announcement
10/8

After class tonight -

* A student said s/he had trouble sending a message to ics45j@ics.uci.edu, the class email alias. I've checked it out, including sending messages to it, and it appears to be working ok now. If it acts up again, please let me know.

* A student reported that Lab 1 was giving compile time errors that seemed to indicate that a file was missing from the project. I checked it out, and somehow a couple of old versions of files crept into the Lab 1 project file I posted, leading to the errors. I've replaced the files with the correct versions. I think things are ok now--but if not, again please do let me know.
